data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 Anniversary Update, Latest Discord Canary
data.actual_result: `Add reactions` is available, and the client try to add the reaction
data.short_description: Add reactions is available when right-clicking Clyde messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Get any Clyde's message (with `/nick` for example) - Right-click on the message, and see the `Add reactions` option
